TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KnownTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class KnownTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class KnownTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies types that should be recognized by the when serializing or deserializing a given type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute> attribute to a type to indicate to the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> types that should be recognized when serializing or deserializing an instance of the type to which the attribute is applied. This attribute could also be recognized by other serializers that understand data contracts.
> [!NOTE] > In your code, you can use the word `KnownType` instead of the longer `KnownTypeAttribute`.
You can either apply exactly one <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute> instance with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute.MethodName%2A> property set, or one or more <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute> instances with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute.Type%2A> property set.
## Examples The following example shows a type named `Person` and a type named `IDInformation` that should be recognized when serializing or deserializing the `Person` type.
[!code-csharp[KnownTypeAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute/cs/overview.cs#0)] [!code-vb[KnownTypeAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute/vb/overview.vb#0)]

Docs.param: The name of the method that returns an of types used when serializing or deserializing data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of a method that returns an of known types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor uses a method name that matches a method of the class. The method returns a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of <xref:System.Type> objects. During serialization or deserialization, the types found in the collection can be used within the root type to which the attribute is applied.
## Examples The following example uses the `methodName` parameter to identify a method in the type that contains an array of <xref:System.Type> objects.
[!code-csharp[KnownTypeAttribute_Ctor_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute_ctor_string/cs/knowntype_ctor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KnownTypeAttribute_Ctor_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute_ctor_string/vb/knowntypeattribute_ctor1.vb#1)]

Docs.param: The that is included as a known type when serializing or deserializing data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MethodName As String
public: property System::String ^ MethodName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of a method that will return a list of types that should be recognized during serialization or deserialization.
Docs.value: A that contains the name of the method on the type defined by the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The method must exist on the class or structure that the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute> is applied to, must be static, must accept no parameters, and must return an instance of any type that implements the generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface, such as the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class, or an array of <xref:System.Type> objects.
The method is called once per application domain when the data contract is loaded for the type.
## Examples The following example uses the `methodName` parameter to identify a method in the type that contains an array of <xref:System.Type> objects.
[!code-csharp[KnownTypeAttribute_Ctor_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute_ctor_string/cs/knowntype_ctor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KnownTypeAttribute_Ctor_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/knowntypeattribute_ctor_string/vb/knowntypeattribute_ctor1.vb#1)]
